com.tabuto.jsimlife
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.tabuto.jsimlife.Configuration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This Class wrap some JSimLife parameter. Each parameter are its own setter and getter methods and a default values that configuration auto load if they run for the first time. Parameters actually present into JSimLife Configuration is:

  • Background Color
  • Locale Language preferences
  • JSimLife default path
  • Playfield dimension (width and height)
  • Max Zlife number
  • Max Zretador number
  • Max Zetatron number
  • Max seeds number

Author:
tabuto83
